message.body: Any thoughts on memory? 128 vs 256?
Always more...256. For what?
For the macbook air...considering specs
Isn't 256 kind of low? Should be like 2 or 4 gig
Hmm maybe I'm thinking of something else then...
Flash storage
That should be even bigger. Send me a link???
http://store.apple.com/us/browse/home/shop_mac/family/macbook_air?aid=AIC-WWW-NAUS-K2-CONFIGURE-MACBOOKAIR
The 999.99 one would be pretty powerful
The 1099 has twice as much storage though- that's the only diff
Btw I'm working on M to get the $ to buy this for you...school supplies yknow
Ahh okay I see...is 999 one still a good amount of storage, esp for school?
Yes
Hey just talked to Mom- we'll pick up the tab for the 1099 Mac...
Or something thereabouts ...
Whoa, really?! That is extremely generous. Thank you!!
You are very welcome...when were you going to get it?
I would get the 1199 with the 13 inch screen if I were you. Same hardware as the 1099 but a 13 inch screen (think movies...)
At some point before the end of august when classes start (I believe they start the last week of aug) ...and hey, whatever you recommend. .
Well for a hundred more you get A LOT of storage, a faster processer, and a bigger screen...no brainer
Makes sense!
Got to go practice before I forget how to play guitar...
Haha...enjoy...
Yes...by the way I posted a new version of the birdstone song on FB. Check it out when you need a break at the office ;-)
Ahh will do!
NICE!!! Well deserved too...shoot mom an email with the picture ok? She's home with a migraine today:-(
We are so proud of you!!
Aww poor thing, will do!
And thank you!
For the declaration of pride, haha
Ah the DofP. No problem. Have a great party!!!
